an5.96:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu anapanassatim asevanto nacirasseva akuppam pativijjhati.
an5.96:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appattho hoti appakicco subharo susantoso jivitaparikkharesu;
an5.96:1.6: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha;
an5.96:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu anapanassatim asevanto nacirasseva akuppam pativijjhati”ti.
